content: --विद्या [अंगरूपा व्याकरणादिशास्त्ररूपा विद्या ज्ञानसाधनं] {1} the science of grammar &c. contributing to knowledge. {2} the science of foretelling good or evil by the movements of limbs; <ab>N.</ab> of chapter 51 of <ls>Bṛhat Saṃhitā</ls> which gives full details of this science; न नक्षत्रांगविद्यया… भिक्षां लिप्सेतकर्हिचित् <ls>Ms. 6. 50.</ls>
